title: Telkom University
desc: I graduated with a Bachelor's degree in Informatics from Telkom University. During my studies, I actively participated in various organizations and roles, such as serving as an Event Organizer for Nihon no Matsuri 12, a member of the Al-Fath student club, and a Practicum Assistant in the Informatics Lab.

title: Leholeh Indonesia
desc: I work as a freelancer which help frontend developer to develop UI on desktop web app Leholeh. I have created several part of web including payment, cart, admin feature, and catalogue.

title: Houset
desc: Being part-timer in a startup Houset as a Frontend Web Developer. In this project I use HTML, CSS, Javasript, ReactJS, and Bootstrap.

title: Detikcom
desc: Develop and maintain website ads detik.com. Ads developed: Medium rectangle, Sticky static banner, billboard banner, parallax, skinner, channelbox, vertical billboard, vertical billboard, etc. Develop and maintain website Salesproduct to provide data for supporting sales and marketing team.

title: PuTI Telkom University
desc: Responsible for translating business processes to be developed into "Satu Data" applications. Create business processes on the backend side to generate the required APIs.
